Severing SC Due to Diagnosis Change
A change in diagnosis may be accepted as a basis for severance if there is certification that the diagnosis on whichÂ SC was based was clearly erroneous under
38 CFR 3.105(d)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section B - Severance of Service Connection (SC)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section B
